knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
library(vcd)
library(tidyverse)
goals <- Bundesliga %>% group_by(Year) %>% 
  summarize(hg = sum(HomeGoals), ag = sum(AwayGoals),
            ng = n(), avg = (hg+ag)/ng)


ggplot(goals, aes(Year, avg)) + geom_point() + 
  geom_line() + stat_smooth(method = "loess", span = .5) 


ggplot(goals, aes(Year, avg)) + geom_point() + 
  geom_line() + stat_smooth(method = "gam", formula = y ~ s(x))
```
